hero.title: Excellence in Logistics & Engineering
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in Central Africa for logistics, civil engineering, and construction services

about.title: About Us
about.description: Founded in 2020 by Mr. Jerry KOMBI, Chief Executive Officer, and Mrs. Dorcas CHITWARA, Managing Director, PEARL LOGISTICS AND CIVIL ENGINEERING SERVICES (PELS Sarl) strives to be a reference company in drilling, metal structures, civil and electrical engineering, and logistics in the Democratic Republic of Congo and Central Africa.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We aim for excellence while valuing both our clients and workforce, strictly observing safety and environmental maintenance.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our corporate commitment is to provide employment to young Congolese workforce in all areas of administration, management, and daily project operations.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: We place the client at the center of what we do. We are a tradition of trust. We keep our promise on time.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions for all your logistics and engineering needs

logistics.title: Logistics
logistics.description: We offer unbeatable logistics services while respecting delivery deadlines. We are the leader in logistics because we place the client at the center of what we do.

drilling.title: Drilling
drilling.description: We are an unconditional reference in water drilling and core drilling with experience across various geological terrains in Tanzania, East and Central Africa.

metalStructures.title: Metal Structures
metalStructures.description: Our team of experienced engineers and technicians provides quality work while offering various plans and estimates adapted to your requirements and financial means.

civilEngineering.title: Civil Engineering
civilEngineering.description: Experienced engineers and architects are at your disposal for major works (roads and dams), platform development for drilling using bulldozers, and more.

wasteManagement.title: Waste Management
wasteManagement.description: We process industrial or household waste from unusable products, primarily recycling certain metals, plastics, cardboard, glass, and other materials.

transport.title: Transport
transport.description: We handle the transport of your supplies, materials, and equipment according to the agreed deadline and destination of your choice.
